participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Compassionate and hardworking, Emily is deeply connected to her family and pets, valuing relationships and loyalty.
participant_1.background: my cats are very special to me. my dad taught me everything i know. i enjoy building houses. i'm a construction worker.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and sociable, Michael has a big heart and enjoys spending time with family and friends, particularly over good food.
participant_2.background: i've one brother. i like tacos. i have three sisters. i love dogs.
